attributes.documentation:
@title Breaker Box Interface
@notice Defines the basic interface for the Breaker Box
attributes.name: IBreakerBox

attributes.documentation:
@notice Emitted when a new breaker is added to the breaker box.
@param breaker The address of the breaker.
attributes.name: BreakerAdded

attributes.documentation:
@notice Emitted when a breaker is removed from the breaker box.
@param breaker The address of the breaker.

attributes.documentation:

@param newSortedOracles The address of the new sortedOracles.

BreakerStatusUpdated

attributes.documentation:
@notice Gets the trading mode for the specified rateFeedID.
@param rateFeedID The address of the rate feed to retrieve the trading mode for.
attributes.name: getRateFeedTradingMode

params.rateFeedID: The address of the rate feed to run checks for.
The address of the rate feed to retrieve the trading mode for.

params.breaker: The address of the breaker to check;

isBreaker(address).return: A bool indicating whether or not the breaker has been added.

checkAndSetBreakers(address).notice: Checks breakers for the rateFeedID and sets correct trading mode if any breakers are tripped or need to be reset.

getBreakers().notice: Retrives an array of all breaker addresses.

getRateFeedTradingMode(address).notice: Gets the trading mode for the specified rateFeedID.

isBreaker(address).notice: Checks if a breaker with the specified address has been added to the breaker box.

userdoc.notice: Defines the basic interface for the Breaker Box
